snippet.title: UNHERD Trailer (iOS - Android - PC)
snippet.description:
The game follows a Chinchilla, who awakens in a surreal world with a mysterious voice that looms over him. 

The title’s gameplay and mechanics constitute a departure from the old 3D platformer games, featuring a puzzle like feeling to it, a detailed character movement and interesting visuals.
